components.description: A play-pause icon, showing a right-pointing triangle (play) next to a double vertical bar (pause).
components.title: Black Right-Pointing Triangle with Double Vertical Bar

description: A play-pause icon, showing a right-pointing triangle (play) next to a double vertical bar (pause).
title: Black Right-Pointing Triangle with Double Vertical Bar

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: A play-pause icon, showing a right-pointing triangle (play) next to a double vertical bar (pause). Play or Pause Button was approved as part http://emojipedia.org/black-right-pointing-triangle-with-double-vertical-bar/
emoji_net_data.name: play or pause button

bn:00083943v: To interrupt or cease one's work or occupation temporarily.
To cease or suspend an action temporarily.
To interrupt, to stop or cease temporarily or periodically; to suspend.
To stop the operation of a program or execution of a command temporarily.
To interrupt execution at a given spot, usually for the purpose of debugging.
